description:
A carry-on sized travel backpack with tons of anti-theft features. A hold strap for jackets, coats or travel pillows also hides and protects the main locking system. Smart organization with lots of pockets so you can bring just one bag on your next trip.

  • Main fabric is durable 750-denier recycled polyester with a PFC-free DWR coating for water resistance
  • Exomesh® slash-proof wire mesh is integrated into the panels of the bag
  • All outer zippers can be secured with 1 lock, using the Roobar anti-theft anchor (you supply the lock)
  • Stainless steel anchor cable locks around a fixed object to protect your bag
  • Can be worn on your back or carried briefcase style
  • Interlocking zipper pulls slide on top of one another, making it tough for pickpockets to unzip
  • Puncture-resistant ToughZip helps prevent thieves from forcing zipper teeth open with a pen or small sharp objects
  • Padded adjustable shoulder straps, sternum strap and hipbelt stow behind the back foam panel to fit neatly in overhead compartments
  • Clamshell zipper opening lets you open the bag like a book
  • Lots of pockets, including mesh organizer pockets and a water-bottle pocket
  • Top strap holds a jacket or travel pillow
name: Pacsafe Venturesafe EXP45 45L Travel Pack - Unisex
